title: Blended Learning Design for ICT Integration and Virtual Inquiry in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT Utilization Skills and Foundational Social Phenomenon Analysis
context.additional_context: A virtual reality-based inquiry-integrated curriculum for strengthening social sector competencies among working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can achieve digital literacy competencies to analyze social phenomena using ICT tools
They can design social issue simulations in virtual reality environments and perform collaborative problem-solving experiences
In blended learning environments, they can apply self-directed learning strategies to connect theory to real-world job situations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
